mapper.update: update board set hit = hit +1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board where content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= ${startNum} and rn <=${endNum}
select count (*) from board where content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
